title: Oppo put a periscope inside a phone
description: At MWC 2019, Oppo showed off a new camera system with 10x lossless optical zoom. It works by using three cameras, one of which has a periscope setup inside the body of the phone. It's only a prototype for now, but Oppo will have it in a phone for sale by the summer.
